page.title: 10WORLINGTON SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: We start school at 9a.m.and finish at 3.30p.m. 14 children come by bus,5 walk and the rest come by car.We come in and read the diary which our teacher has written.This tells us what to do.Each term we do a different project.Recently we have learnt about Tudors and Pond Life.We learn different subjects in a project e.g. Geography,Science,History,Maths,Art and English.We also have separate maths lessons.Maths is our favourite subject.We have a morning and dinner break during the day.On Thurs. Graham's mum does book and tape library and Mrs.Barnett teaches guitar on Thurs. and Fri.On Tues. we go swimming at Tiverton and some children go to Music Centre after school.Mrs. Saltmarsh teaches us on Fri. mornings. Sometimes we share facilites with Kings Nympton and Burrington schools.
